M20050216-1722 (3.0.2 RC1)

- run 3.0.2 RC1 with a new workspace
- set Target Platform to an installed 3.1 I-build (I20050222-0821)
- Run > Run As... > Runtime Workbench

-> in the runtime workbench, I get this in the log:

Error Feb 24, 2005 18:48:40.138 -showsplash
java.lang.NullPointerException
at java.lang.ProcessBuilder.start(ProcessBuilder.java:441)
at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Runtime.java:591)
at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Runtime.java:464)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.runCommand(Main.java:1407)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.handleSplash(Main.java:1383)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:258)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:887)
at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:871)

This is not supported.
Changes have been done in the way the command line arguments are being handled
to solve various problems around branding and being able to support exe files.
